name: load-testing-apis
description: A basic k6 load testing project for APIs.

scripts.k6:dashboard: cross-env K6_WEB_DASHBOARD=true K6_WEB_DASHBOARD_EXPORT=report.html k6 cloud run dist/bundle.js
scripts.k6:local: dotenv -e .env -- cross-env K6_WEB_DASHBOARD=true K6_WEB_DASHBOARD_EXPORT=./reports/report.html k6 run dist/bundle.js
